name: Darkest Mana : Master of the Table
description: Darkest Mana: Master of the Table is a card duel game. Create a deck and play online against players from around the world. You can also play solo in 20+ stages.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
